landing.main_title: The Best Place for Plastic Recycling
landing.main_desc: Connect and trade directly with suppliers & buyers of recyclable plastics.
landing.slide_first_desc: Simplify your mass flow verification by using PlastPlace for your Trades
landing.slide_second_desc: Through our practical experience in all areas of the industry, PlastPlace offers you comprehensive consulting opportunities for the sustainability of your company and your products.
landing.slide_third_desc: PlastPlaces personalized ERP connection offers you increased efficiency in transaction processing.
landing.slide_fourth_desc: PlastPlace offers the possibility of an in-depth plastic analysis to ensure the compatibility of your input materials with your processing capabilities
landing.slide_fifth_desc: PlastPlace offers simple coordination of the delivery and loading dates, the commissioning of the forwarding agency and the preparation of an unambiguous document  leads to time savings in the logistics organisation.
landing.slide_sixth_desc: PlastPlaces offers you support in the preparation of tax and waste law compliant invoices and transport documents for every pan-European transaction. Automated preparation of tax and waste law compliant invoices and transport documents for every pan-European transaction.
landing.last_title: Become a part of PlastPlace and benefit from the many advantages PlastPlace offers you!

wanted.be_first: Be the first to know when it’s posted
wanted.add_material_text: Add material you’re looking for to your Wanted List to receive instant notification and email when it’s posted on PlastPlace
wanted.instant_notification: Instant notification (when wanted material is posted)
